filename of the SImage files to process, if this is omitted the file will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Generate an index to an SImage file.

description.p: Generate an index to an SImage file.
The index file is written to standard output.
SImage files can contain multiple images, and the index file allows the plotting software to quickly find a particular image in the file.

example.description: Make an index from the SImage file "test.simage" and write it to the file "test.inx".
